Half life 2 is an amazing open world epicly graphiced game that i loved to play till i broke my old laptop. the game is kinda in a futuristic enviorment where you walk into the shoes of Gordon freeman and take epic risks to kill a very evil (and i mean VERY evil) old Black Mesa administrator named Wallace Breen. i DEFINITLY recommend this game for somelight horror gamers and FPS gamers this one should be in every steam players wishlist or game inventory it is a great game and i would love to play it again :D
It's Half-Life 2.
All I can say is that this game is well worth the $10. Pick up HL2:Ep1 and HL2:Ep2 for the whole story and you've got 30 hours of fun a head of you.
This game is really starting to show it's age, but it's still a wonderful game that's stood the test of time, and will most likely continue to do so.

Excellent game, I recomend starting with this is you are a noob to PC gaming.

While its linearity can give you a somewhat "herded" feeling they give you solid controls.  A good HUD, an almost puzzle like gameplay at moments, and a ton of hidden areas to give is a little replay-ability.
Great Game

Honestly this is one of my favorite if not the best Single-Player campaigns I have played. Though there is currently only the 2 other episodes, you will still appreciate this story and the well-developed characters that are produced in this game. Just get it at some point in your life, then you can ponder why there is no HL3.

The best story based fps ever made. True in-game cinematics made it even better. Pre-rendered cut scenes will never be as good. Yes I am a HL fan boy and I still hold out hope for HL2 ep 3 or HL3.

Definitely a great game. It has an amazing, complex story, a nice european setting, and some pretty awesome weapons. And maybe a small plot twist or two. Maybe.

Also has a crazy monk. That is all.

Si ya con el HL 1 dieron vuelta el mapa de los juevos FPS, con el 2 patearon definitivamente el tablero. El concento de scripting nunca estuvo mejor implementado, Valve demostró que no sólo del motor gráfico viven los juegos. Este tiene una gran historia, y está lleno de escenas de acción imborrables. Especial el capítulo "No vamos a Ravenholm" una perla terrorífica como pocas veces vi. 10/10
Amazing 10/10

El re-diseño de texturas y la calidad grafica a diferencia del Half Life 1, es impresionante.
Un juego que se basa por capitulos y cada uno con una distincion especifica que no te deja siquiera levantarte de la silla para tomar algo.
Y sin dudas es una introduccion a los episodios 1 y 2 de Half Life.
Para aquellos que no jugaron al Half Life 1, seria una pena jugar primero al Half Life 2, sin saber la historia del primero.
